entries.femaleVariant: All right, V, it’s a simple matter. We – all of us standing here – owe you, and it's a great debt.
Thanks for everything, V. And don't worry, we'll get you into that Mikoshi. Isn't that the way of it?
We goin' somewhere?
[Accept jacket] Don't know what to say.
[Accept jacket] Thanks, really appreciate it.
[Accept jacket] Won't let you down, any of you.
Don't know what to say.
Thanks, um… thank you. Really appreciate it… everything.
entries.maleVariant: Thanks, um… thank you. I-- I really appreciate it… everything.

entries.femaleVariant: What's it they say? "Easier to gain a cobra's trust than an Aldecaldo's"?
entries.maleVariant: What's it they say? "Easier to gain a cobra's trust than an Aldecaldo's."

entries.femaleVariant: A raid is a raid, but this is still your night, so bask a bit in the newfound glory.
[Give hand] We goin' somewhere?
All right, fam, listen up. Today we celebrate, but tomorrow is shaping up to be a helluva day.
Do whatever needs doing, then get some rest.
You're going to be an Aldecaldo. Which means this family will go to hell and back for you.
Gathering – what's it about?
What's with the gathering? Somethin' off?
entries.maleVariant: What's with the gatherin'? Somethin' off?

entries.femaleVariant: It's nothing about the raid.
Saul's right, though. I mean, let's face it, V – my life was in a million pieces, you broke it into a million more.
But sometimes it's only then that you can piece it together again.
Welcome to the family.
No, like… I really don't. Never expected this. Thank you.
If you want to talk, I'll be up there.
Hop up here.
V. Come on over.
So it's about time we fixed that.
Could've given me a heads up about this.
[Hop off] You could've warned me.
And how's the jacket? Not too tight?
Snug as a glove.
Missed all this, y'know?
Snug as a glove. Feels like I've been wearing it a while.
Missed this, y'know – the camaraderie?
And ruined all the fun? Are you kidding?
Don't you think you have?
I know. I saw it, in your heart, the first time we met. Probably because I was missing it, too, then.
So I know how much this means – to you, to me. Thank you. Will not let you down.
Saul! You wanted a word?
Hop on and you'll find out.
Speak for yourself, Saul!
But in spite of that, you're still an outsider. A mercenary from Night City, from what might as well be another world.
Hey, ask Panam – she knows!
Ready, kid?
Ready.
Sure about this? Know how much this means.
Almost gave me a heart attack…
Do your worst.
Don't worry, it's but a formality. You've been a de facto member of this family for a while now.
Go to hell.
You saved my rumpus, and as Bobby tells it, Mitch's too. I won't even mention Panam.
Well spoken.
Feel a lot more responsible for these people now.
Jacket's a… distinction, honor to get it. And... it's preem at that. But... it's got that weight…
entries.maleVariant: Jacket's a… distinction. Honor to get it. And it's preem at that. But it's got that weight…

entries.femaleVariant: You earned this jacket. And the Aldecaldos' devotion.
Thanks, Panam.
[Accept jacket] Once we get back from Mikoshi, I'm buyin' a round.
Jacket's incredible.
Listen, soon as we're back from Mikoshi, we'll celebrate – and I know just the place. My treat, of course.
We'll hold you to that!
Shit, turned me damn sentimental.
Took me under your wing, gave me your trust, and tomorrow… op I'm takin' you on, might not come back.
entries.maleVariant: Took me under your wing, gave me your trust, and tomorrow… the op I'm takin' you on, you might not come back.

entries.femaleVariant: Hit me all of a sudden, a sec ago.
That only proves we're doing the right thing. The sense of responsibility? It's what being part of a family feels like.
In Night City, you're alone even in a crowd. But here… feels like I'm a part of somethin' important.
So you are where you need to be.
Fuck me, Saul. Brought me to the brink of a heart attack.
I… Saul… You all sure about this?
Does this look like one big jest?
Look, I know what this means. Used to wear clan colors, too. But to be an Aldecaldo… I dunno if you should…
Just answer the question – are you ready?
A downright injustice, it is! It needs fixing!
Christ, someone get her a hanky, else the poor thing'll start a flash flood.
entries.maleVariant: Christ, someone get him a hanky, else the poor thing'll start a flash flood.

entries.femaleVariant: It's about time you didn't.
See? She likes it!
Are you all right?
Yeah… ahem, it's nothin'. Don't worry about it.
entries.maleVariant: Yeah… it's nothin'. Don't worry about it.

entries.femaleVariant: Climb on up here.
Well? Don't be shy.
You're one of us now, V. You're an Aldecaldo, dammit!
You saved my rumpus, as Bobby tells it. And I won't even mention Panam.
Don't you worry, V, we'll get you into that Mikoshi. Isn't that the way of it?
C'mon, V, say your piece!
Come on, you can't stay there forever.
Speech, speech!
She flabbergasted, she is!
Are you all right?
V, are you well or not?
A warm welcome for our newest Aldecaldo!
Welcome to the clan, the most dysfunctional ever!
Great to have you with us, V!
We'll raise a toast to you!
This occasion calls for a drink, I say!
Thanks for everything, V! Aldecaldos always pay their debts!
So maybe you'll finally pay me back? I've been waiting a year!
